SVGComponentTransferFunctionElement.summary: The SVGComponentTransferFunctionElement interface represents a base interface used by the component transfer function interfaces.

SVGComponentTransferFunctionElementOffse.summary: The offset read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("offset")}} attribute of the given element.

SVGComponentTransferFunctionElementTable.summary: The tableValues read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("tableValues")}} attribute of the given element.

SVGComponentTransferFunctionElementSlope.summary: The slope read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("slope")}} attribute of the given element.

SVGComponentTransferFunctionElementInter.summary: The intercept read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("intercept")}} attribute of the given element.

SVGComponentTransferFunctionElementExpon.summary: The exponent read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("exponent")}} attribute of the given element.

SVGComponentTransferFunctionElementAmpli.summary: The amplitude read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("amplitude")}} attribute of the given element.

SVGComponentTransferFunctionElementType.summary: The type read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("type")}} attribute of the given element. It takes one of the SVG_FECOMPONENTTRANSFER_TYPE_* constants defined on this interface.
